channel.title: Really starting to piss me off
channel.description:
Okay, well i just downloaded a 525 server and client, Dannyskape 525. The server runs properly and everything, but when i try to login with the certain client it gives me an error. error_j5_gameconnect. I know this means that it cant connect to the server properly but if i tried to login with different clients i can connect, but i dont use them because its very buggy, (Walking Through Walls, Glutched Names, ECT.) Idk if this has something to do with the ip adress because i changed it once in client.java from 127.0.0.1 to my ip. If anyone knows how to make it work then that would be great.
Ive tried the following..
Adding my Ip to Exceptions in firewall settings Searching the other folders for 127.0.0.1 Restarting my internet
None of them worked, so if anyone knows how to fix this that would be great.
[I WILL Rep++ for help]

item.title: Really starting to piss me off
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“chance1234, post:9, topic:354360”][quote author=Jingojohn link=topic=450746.msg3305445#msg3305445 date=1281635104]
Well sorry that I saw the same error code in your other topic. You have anger issues. Calm down… No need to piss others off when you are… It just annoys the crap out of others.
[/quote]
wow really? dude shut the fuck up! you were accusing him! he has a right to be pissed off. i hate people like you tbh. you think ur cool shit then u get shown up. then you say something bad about the person that just owned you. really? stfu for real.[/quote]
How about you shut the fuck up. K? All Jingojohn did was tell the OP not to double post. Which is against the rules. He had a right to accuse him because he’s guilty. So yea, piss off.
